content:
In the Odessa region, at night, Ukrainian servicemen destroyed two enemy reconnaissance drones.

This is said inmessageNavy of the Armed Forces in Telegrams.

"On the night of March 18 to 19 in the Odessa region, 2 hostile intelligence drones were shot down by the forces and means of units of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine," the statement said.

Earlier, Colonel Natalia Humeniuk, a spokeswoman for southern Ukraine forces of UkraineShe toldAs Ukrainian fighters successfully fight the means of radar fight against drones of the Russian occupation army.

As reported by the Armyinform, for the last day of the Defense Force of UkraineReflected the attacks of the enemyin seven directions.
title: Two Russian reconnaissance drones were knocked down at night at night
